```{=html}
<script src="https://d3js.org/d3.v7.min.js"/>

<svg id="canvas" width="600" height="200"/>
```

```{js}
const data =
  [25, 30, 20]

const svg =
  d3.select('#canvas')

const circles =
  svg.selectAll('circle')

circles
  .data(data)
  .enter()
    .append('circle')
    .attr('cx', (_, i) => { return 40 + i*30 })
    .attr('cy', 50)
    .attr('r', (d) => { return d/2 })
    .attr('fill', 'green')
```
